text:
Guizhou is a province of the People's Republic of China in the southwestern part of the country. Its capital city is Guiyang.
Guizhou is a relatively poor and economically undeveloped province, but rich in natural, cultural and environmental resources. Demographically it is one of China's most diverse provinces. Minority groups such as the Miao / Hmong and Yao make up more than 37% of the population.
